metadata.dc:author: Foyo-Niembro, E
metadata.dc:description: This is preliminary report describing a new clinical sign observed by the author in three cases of severed hands, and in several cases, following re-implantation within eight-hours after the accident. This sign has a useful prognostic value, based on its uniform and constant characteristics, in the evolution of re-implanted hands after severe trauma.
metadata.dc:title: Significado pron√≥stico del arco rojo en el lecho ungueal de las manos reimplantadas.
[The presence of a red arch in the nail bed of a reimplanted hand and its prognostic value].
